languages.text: {n}Владайм принимает смерть с издевательской улыбкой, не сводя взгляда с раздраженно сжавшей губы Инцендии.{/n}
{n}Vladaym accepts death with a mocking smile, never looking away from Incendia, who presses her lips together in annoyance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм принимает смерть с издевательской улыбкой, не сводя взгляда с раздраженно сжавшей губы Инцендии.{/n}

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆脸上挂着嘲弄的微笑，接受了死亡，目光死死地盯着因森蒂娅，而因森蒂娅恼怒地抿紧了双唇。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym accepts death with a mocking smile, never looking away from Incendia, who presses her lips together in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆脸上挂着嘲弄的微笑，接受了死亡，目光死死地盯着因森蒂娅，而因森蒂娅恼怒地抿紧了双唇。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは小馬鹿にした笑顔のまま死を受け入れた。インセンディアからは一瞬たりとも目を離さなかった。それを見たインセンディアは苛立ちに唇を噛みしめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym accepts death with a mocking smile, never looking away from Incendia, who presses her lips together in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは小馬鹿にした笑顔のまま死を受け入れた。インセンディアからは一瞬たりとも目を離さなかった。それを見たインセンディアは苛立ちに唇を噛みしめていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym acepta la muerte con una sonrisa burlona, sin apartar la mirada de Incendia, que aprieta los labios con fastidio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym accepts death with a mocking smile, never looking away from Incendia, who presses her lips together in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym acepta la muerte con una sonrisa burlona, sin apartar la mirada de Incendia, que aprieta los labios con fastidio.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym akzeptiert den Tod mit einem spöttischen Grinsen, ohne den Blick je von Incendia abzuwenden, die ihre Lippen gereizt zusammenpresst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym accepts death with a mocking smile, never looking away from Incendia, who presses her lips together in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym akzeptiert den Tod mit einem spöttischen Grinsen, ohne den Blick je von Incendia abzuwenden, die ihre Lippen gereizt zusammenpresst.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym accepte la mort avec un sourire goguenard, sans quitter Incendia des yeux, laquelle pince les lèvres d'agacement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym accepts death with a mocking smile, never looking away from Incendia, who presses her lips together in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym accepte la mort avec un sourire goguenard, sans quitter Incendia des yeux, laquelle pince les lèvres d'agacement.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Ölümü alaycı bir gülümsemeyle kabul eden Vladaym, sinirli bir şekilde dudaklarını birbirine bastıran İncendia'dan gözlerini katiyen ayırmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym accepts death with a mocking smile, never looking away from Incendia, who presses her lips together in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym, ölümü alaycı bir gülümsemeyle kabul ediyor, sinirli bir şekilde dudaklarını birbirine bastıran İncendia'dan gözlerini katiyetle çevirmiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
